Package strategy

Class Cheater

java.lang.Object
strategy.PlayerStrategy
strategy.Cheater
public class Cheater
extends PlayerStrategy
This class has the behavior of the Cheater Player. All the neighbor countries are acquired by this Cheater Player and armies are doubled in those neighbor countries that are recently conquered.

    Constructor to Instantiate the members of Cheater Class.

  • Method Summary
